text.string: Auto-update when an update is available

language.text: 當伺服器有新版的時候自動更新

text.string: Retrieve the current version on server start

language.text: 伺服器啟動時檢查當前版本

text.string: Notify me when a server update is available

language.text: 當伺服器有新版時提醒我

text.string: Show a dialog that prompts to update when an update is available. Note: the serve

language.text: 當有可用更新時開啟新視窗進行更新 提醒%3a+伺服器

text.string: r won't start until the dialog has been closed.

language.text: 直到視窗關閉前不起動.+

text.string: Copy the selected items to your clipboard

language.text: 複製所有項目到剪貼簿
隱藏伺服器堆疊追蹤訊息

text.string: Load the plugin list when the server starts. This list is +- 2Mb.
plugin list will only be loaded when visiting this tab

language.text: 只有在瀏覽這個標籤頁時才會讀取插件

text.string: Right click for options, double click for details.

language.text: 右鍵點擊查看訊息，雙擊查看詳細訊息

text.string: Right click for options, double click for details. Ctrl+click or Shift+click to s

language.text: 右鍵點擊查看訊息，雙擊查看詳細訊息。Ctrl%2b點擊+或+Shift%2b點擊選取多個項目

text.string: Right-click to see all available actions

language.text: 右鍵點擊查看所有可以使用的行動

text.string: Right-click to see al available actions.

language.text: 右鍵點擊查看所有可以使用的行動

text.string: This project takes a lot of time.

language.text: 這程式花費了我們相當大的時間+

text.string: Start the server when the GUI starts, using the settings from the SuperStart tab.

language.text: 當開啟程式時自動啟動伺服器

text.string: You might need to restart the GUI, in order for
these settings to take full eff

language.text: 開啟"伺服器設定"標籤頁
當開啟程式時自動啟動伺服器

text.string: Set the language for the GUI.

language.text: 當伺服器發出消息時播放音效

text.string: Play a sound when the server sends a severe message

language.text: 當伺服器發出消息時播放音效
當有錯誤訊息時播放音效

text.string: Play a sound when the server sends a warning

language.text: 當有警告訊息時播放音效
當玩家離開時播放音效

text.string: Play a sound when a player leaves the server

language.text: 當玩家離開時播放音效
當玩家加入時播放音效

text.string: Play a sound when a player connects to the server

language.text: 當玩家加入時播放音效

text.string: Show a tray balloon when the server throws a warning message

language.text: 當伺服器發出警告訊息時在托盤區提醒

text.string: Show a tray balloon when a player leaves.

language.text: 當有玩家離開時在托盤區提醒

text.string: Show a tray balloon when a player joins.

language.text: 當有玩家加入時在托盤區提醒

text.string: Show a tray balloon when the server throws a severe message

language.text: 當伺服器發出訊息時在托盤區提醒
總是顯示小圖示在托盤區

text.string: Minimize the GUI to tray when the minimize button is clicked.
The font size that will be used for most lists and textboxes.

language.text: 險式伺服器狀況的字體大小.

text.string: Restart the GUI for the changes to take effect
Error while loading plugins. Probably the server could not be reached.

language.text: 插件讀取錯誤，可能是版本的差異

text.string: You can right click and try refreshing.

language.text: 你可以嘗試點擊重新整理.

text.string: If you selected a category, it's possible that this category is empty.
Run this task when the server starts.

language.text: 當伺服器啟動時執行這個任務

text.string: Run this task before the server starts.

language.text: 伺服器啟動前執行這個任務

text.string: Run this task when the server stops.

language.text: 伺服器停止時執行這個任務

text.string: Run this task before the server stops.

language.text: 伺服器停止前執行這個任務

text.string: Run this task every hh:mm:ss while the server is running.

language.text: 當伺服器執行中，每 hh:mm:ss 執行這個任務

text.string: Run this task when the computer time is equal to hh:mm:ss.

language.text: 當電腦時間 hh%3amm%3ass 時，執行這個任務

text.string: The time in hh:mm:ss. You can add multiple times, each in hh:mm:ss format, split by ;

language.text: 時間hh%3amm%3ass.你可以以這個格式hh%3amm%3ass增加多個時間點，使用;符號來一次指定多個

text.string: Run this task every time a player joins the server.

language.text: 每當玩家加入時執行這個任務

text.string: Optional: the player name(s) to trigger at, split by;

language.text: 可選:輸入玩家id來觸發，使用;符號來一次指定多個

text.string: Run this task every time a player disconnects.
Optional: the player name(s) to trigger at, split by ;

language.text: 可選:輸入玩家id來觸發，使用;符號來一次指定多個

text.string: Run this task when a player disconnects and there are no longer players online.

language.text: 最後一個玩家離開時執行這個任務

text.string: Run this task when the server doesn't respond any longer. This task will send a heartbeat to the server, and check if the server responds

language.text: 當伺服器沒有回應時傳送一則訊息給伺服器，測試伺服器是否回應

text.string: The amount of time between 2 heartbeats, in hh:mm:ss

language.text: 兩次測視訊息的間隔時間，格式:hh%3amm%3ass

text.string: Run this task when another task finished. You can set an optional timeout.

language.text: 當某個任務結束時執行這個任務，可以設定任務結束後的延遲。

text.string: the name of the task. You can add a timeout, by adding the time in /hh:mm:ss format after the task name.

language.text: 設定結束的任務名稱與結束後觸發的延遲時間，格式:"任務名稱/hh:mm:ss"

text.string: Run this task when certain text is received from the server. Warning! this might be CPU intensive!

language.text: 當某則訊息出現在伺服器時執行這個任務 注意:這可能造成CPU過度的使用

text.string: the text that will trigger this. Note: if this text is CONTAINED in the server text, the event will run.
Run a program, or a file that is associated with a default program.
the path to the program or file

language.text: 執行一個CMD的命令.(以CMD執行這則命令)

text.string: Send a command to the server, if the server is running.

language.text: 當伺服器執行中，執行一個命令到伺服器

text.string: the command to send. You can specify multiple commands, separated by ;

language.text: 輸入命令，使用;符號來一次指定多個

text.string: Stop the server, if it's running.
Start the server, if it isn't already running. No parameters required.

language.text: 起動伺服器 無須參數

text.string: The server will start with the settings set in the superstart tab.

language.text: 根據"超級啟動"標籤頁的設定啟動伺服器

text.string: Restart the server, if it's running. No parameters required.

language.text: 伺服器重啟 無須參數

text.string: Restart a server that doesn't respond, by killing it and starting it again. Might cause data loss. USE WITH CAUTION.

language.text: 強制關閉並且重啟伺服器，注意:這可能造成資料流失.

text.string: Create a backup. Enter the name of the backup to execute.

language.text: 創造備份檔。輸入備份的名字。

text.string: Sycnhronize the GUI player list with the server player list

language.text: 同步BukkitGUI與伺服器的玩家清單

text.string: Kick all the players that are online.

language.text: 踢除所有在線上的玩家.

text.string: Optional: the reason for kicking them. (if you have a plugin that supports kick reasons)

language.text: 可選:踢除的理由(假如你有安裝支援的插件)

text.string: The name of the task. Doesn't affect the working of the task.

language.text: 任務名稱。不影響運行的任務.

text.string: Explanation: Please select a type first

language.text: 強制關閉伺服器並且重新啟動

text.string: The name must be at least 1 character long
Time should be in format hh:mm:ss
You need to enter a file or program

language.text: 你必須輸入檔案或程式

text.string: Double click for more information. Right Click for options.

language.text: 雙擊獲得更多資訊.右鍵點擊來獲得更多選項.

text.string: Right click for options, double click for details. Ctrl+click or Shift+click to select multiple items.

language.text: 右鍵點擊查看訊息，雙擊查看詳細訊息。Ctrl%2b點擊+or+Shift%2b點擊選取多個項目

text.string: Do you really want to kill the server? This can corrupt your data!

language.text: 確定要強制關閉伺服器?這有可能造成資料的流失

text.string: No data for this plugin available

language.text: 找不到這插件相符的資料

text.string: You need to enter a command
You didn't enter valid values. Make sure all values are valid, and try again

language.text: 未輸入有效的值，確認後重試

text.string: The server could not be started, reason:

language.text: 伺服器不能被啟動，因為

text.string: This is probably caused by another server that is running already.

language.text: 可能有另一個伺服器正在運行中

text.string: Kill all java instances, and retry to start this server?

language.text: 強制關閉所有java程式，並且重新嘗試?

text.string: An update is available. If you continue, this update will be installed automaticl
Note: if the server is running, it will be stopped while updating

language.text: 注意:更新時伺服器會關閉

text.string: One of your backup profiles wasn't loaded: the file is probably corrupt! The backup profile was removed.

language.text: 備份檔讀取失敗，或許有檔案損毀，備份檔已經被移除。

text.string: Error while importing the Backup! Is this a valid file?

language.text: 導入備份檔錯誤，確定檔案是否正確?

text.string: The backup can't be performed: the following drive could not be found. Is this a removeable device (e.g. USB stick)

language.text: 備份失敗: 路徑錯誤，可能是因為使用卸除是硬碟。

text.string: Reason: Nothing selected to backup. Select folders first.

language.text: 理由: 選擇錯誤，請先選擇一個資料夾

text.string: An error occured while creating a backup for the following backup scheme:
The backup might be incomplete or corrupt. Make sure all task settings are valid. The error has been logged

language.text: 備份不完整或者損毀. 確定所有的任務是正確的. 錯誤被記錄在log檔裡

text.string: Could not get data for this plugin

language.text: 不能讀取到插件的紀錄

text.string: Error: No downloads are available for this project. It is probably still under construction.

language.text: 錯誤:下載錯誤，他可能還在建構階段。

text.string: Error while loading plugins. Internet available?

language.text: 插件讀取錯誤，請確認網路是否有連接

text.string: An error occured while loading this data
The file you chose to download is not supported yet.

language.text: 你下載的檔案不被支援

text.string: At this moment only .jar and .zip files are supported.
couldn't be installed. You have to visit the project page in order to install it manually.

language.text: 安裝失敗，你必須到原網上尋找安裝方式，並且手動安裝。

text.string: A restart is required in order for the changes to take effect. The GUI will now close itself

language.text: 必須要重啟才會生效，BukkitGUI即將關閉。

text.string: The current bukkit version could not be determined. It seems like you don't have permissions to do this. Try running the GUI as administator

language.text: 現在的bukkit版本不被支援. 可能是你沒有權限.嘗試以管理員執行BukkitGUI

text.string: Compress backup to reduce disk usage.

language.text: 壓縮備份檔來減少空間消耗。
選擇備份的資料夾，使用;符號來選取多個。
選擇需要備份的資料夾
選擇存放備份檔的資料夾

text.string: You can only use the following characters: a-z ; 1-9 ; _ ; -

language.text: 只可以使用這些字符: a-z ; 1-9 ; _ ; -

text.string: You need to specify at least 1 directory
You need to specify the destination directory
Please write your feedback in English.

language.text: 請用英文寫下你的反饋.

text.string: The downloaded file could not be saved. Are you allowed to write to this location? Try running as administrator

language.text: 下載的檔案不能被儲存. 路徑是否為唯讀？請使用管理員在嘗試一次

text.string: You will now be redirected to a 3rd party website that is not owned by Bertware.

language.text: 你將被導向第三方不是作者的網站。

text.string: Could not load plugin data for this plugin

language.text: 不能讀取這個插件的資料

text.string: I have read and accept the
Force update if already up to date
You need to enter a backup name

language.text: 你需要輸入一個備份檔名稱

text.string: You need to enter a valid backup name

language.text: 你需要輸入一個備份檔名稱

text.string: Could not get ticket ID, upload cancelled. If you want to report this error manually, you can contact us at

language.text: 找不到ticket ID，上傳失敗。假如你要手動回報錯誤，你可以聯繫

text.string: This bug report can't be submitted automaticly: program outdated.

language.text: 錯誤報告不能自動被傳送: program outdated.

text.string: Please make sure you have the latest version

language.text: 請確認你使用的是最新版本

text.string: If you want to report this error manually, you can contact us at

language.text: 假如你要手動回報錯誤，你可以聯繫

text.string: The log has been uploaded. Thank you for sending it towards us!
You can keep this for future reference.

language.text: 你可以留存，以備將來參考.

text.string: Error while importing the task! Is this a valid file?

language.text: 導入任務失敗，請確認檔案是否無誤

text.string: The taskmanager couldn't execute this task:

language.text: 任務管理器不能執行這項任務:

text.string: Couldn't get the backup settings for backup scheme

language.text: 無法得到備份設置的資料

text.string: You have to accept in order to use the application. Do you want to exit?

language.text: 你必須允許這個程式的使用. 你確定要離開?

text.string: Access to to the following folder was denied.

language.text: 以下資料夾不能被讀取.

text.string: Please run this app as administrator to ensure proper working

language.text: 請以管理員執行這個程式

text.string: You need to stop the server in order to remove this plugin. Stop server?

language.text: 你必須要關閉伺服器來移除這個插件，確定要關閉伺服器嗎?

text.string: It seems that this folder was created by the plugin:

language.text: 這個資料夾是由插件創造的:

text.string: Plugin removal failed. There might be some files left undeleted

language.text: 插件移除失敗. 或許有些檔案不能被刪除

text.string: Failed to connect to remote server. Are the credentials correct?

language.text: 連線遠端伺服器失敗. 這個credentials是正確的嗎?

text.string: The java path could not be found, server start aborted

language.text: java路徑錯誤，伺服器不能被啟動

text.string: Please select the correct java version in the superstart tab

language.text: 請在"超級啟動"選擇正確的java版本。

text.string: Could not start the process - no executable given
The server could not be started. It seems like you don't have permissions to access needed files. Try running the GUI as administator

language.text: 伺服器啟動失敗。可能你沒有擁有權限，請嘗試以管理員開啟BukkitGUI。

text.string: The server could not be started. It seems like you don't have permissions to do this. Try running the GUI as administator

language.text: 伺服器啟動失敗。可能你沒有擁有權限，請嘗試以管理員開啟BukkitGUI。

text.string: The program couldn't find this executable:
The server should be running before you can send commands.

language.text: 伺服器必須先運行才能傳送指令

text.string: The command could not be sent due to an error. See the log file for more information

language.text: 指令傳送失敗，查看log檔來獲得更多資訊

text.string: It seems that the server stopped responding. Do you want to kill the server?

language.text: 伺服器無回應，確定要強制關閉嗎？

text.string: The server is still running. Do you want to stop the server and exit the GUI?

language.text: 伺服器正在運行中，你確定要關閉伺服器並且關閉BukkitGUI?

text.string: The server could not be started: the .jar file specified could not be found. Please make sure all superstart settings are valid.

language.text: 伺服器啟動失敗: .jar檔遺失。請確認"超級啟動"標籤頁裡的設定是正確的。

text.string: Your current bukkit version couldn't be determined

language.text: 你現在的bukkit版本不被支援

text.string: A new bukkit version is available:
A new version for bukkit is available:
Bukkit was updated to the latest version:
Killed remote server connection due to an error in remote reader thread.

language.text: 因為遠端讀取錯誤，所以強制關閉遠端連線.

text.string: Killed remote server connection, severe error in remote reader thread. Please report this bug.

language.text: 因為遠端讀取錯誤，強制關閉遠端連線，請回報這個錯誤.

text.string: Your current bukkit version could not be determined

language.text: 你現在的bukkit版本不能被支援

text.string: The server settings you entered are invalid

language.text: 你輸入的伺服器設定是無效的

text.string: You must enter a path to the .jar file
Invalid file path, must be a .jar file

language.text: 錯誤的路徑，必須選擇.jar檔

text.string: You can't use more then 1024MB RAM with Java x32

language.text: 你不能使用32位元的java超過1024MB RAM

text.string: These changes will take effect the next time you start the GUI

language.text: These changes will take effect the next time you start the GUI

text.string: Do you really want to reset all GUI settings?

language.text: 你確定要重置所有BukkitGUI的設定?

text.string: All settings will be resetted. You need to restart the GUI in order for the changes to take effect

language.text: 所有的設定已經被重置，你必須重啟BukkitGUI，來讓效果被啟用。

text.string: Can't access autostart functions! Are you running this as administrator?

language.text: 無法使用自動啟動的功能，確定你是否為電腦管理者。

text.string: The following xml file could not be loaded. Please check for errors

language.text: 這個xml檔無法被讀取，請確認後再使用。

text.string: Oh no! something went wrong in the application. The application is unable to continue it's work, and will exit. Please report this error to the developers

language.text: Oh no! something went wrong in the application. The application is unable to continue it's work, and will exit. Please report this error to the developers

text.string: This file is too big to send using the error report. If you want to report it, please upload %appdata%/Bertware/BukkitGUI/Logging/BukkitGUI.log and send it to contact@bertware.net

language.text: 文件太大以至於無法傳送，你可以到路徑 %appdata%/Bertware/BukkitGUI/Logging/BukkitGUI.log 傳送這個檔案到 contact@bertware.net

text.string: Can't send bug report: no internet available

language.text: 傳送錯誤: 未偵測到有網路

text.string: Enable this if you need to read chinese (or other UTF-8) text from the server out

language.text: 假如你需要讀取中文(或其他UTF-8)編碼的輸出

text.string: put, or need to write chinese (or other UTF-8) text to the server input.

language.text: ，或讀取中文(或其他UTF-8編碼)的輸入請勾選這個選項

text.string: WARNING: No craftbukkit file selected, bukkit version can't be determined. Auto update check cancelled.

language.text: 警告:你所選擇的craftbukkit檔案版本未被定義，自動更新取消。

text.string: WARNING: Turn of "retrieve current version" in superstart > maintainance
WARNING: or make sure the .jar file contains bukkit
